alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 7:57PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CONVERSE COUNTY THROUGH 845 PM MDT... At 757 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bill to 8 miles west of Manning Ranch. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bill and Dull Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
